title: Pour la Peau D'un Flic = for a Cop's Hide
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Que d'os' by Jean-Patrick Manchette.
description: Choucas, a former cop turned private investigator, is asked by an old lady to investigate the disappearance of a young blind girl. It all seem a very mundane case. But shortly after starting the investigation, Choucas receives the visit of a very strange and nosy person. Then, later on, the old lady is murdered on her way to a meeting with Choucas.  Credits: Producer, director, Alain Delon ; writers, Alain Delon, Christopher Frank ; photography, Jean Tournier ; music, Oscar Benton ; art direction, Theo Meurisse. Cast: Alain Delon, Anne Parillaud, Daniel Ceccaldi, Michel Auclair.
